thread.section_title: Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic
thread.title_full: Fantastic - Review of Hotel Bradford Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JJC04
title: Fantastic
text:
Stayed here for one night on business. Really great hotel, makes a nice change to stay in a hotel with character instead of the bland rooms you get with the big brands.
Service was great; attentive, helpful and always with a smile!Breakfast was good with a huge choice. The free soft drinks was a really nice touch and the rooms were comfy and well equipped.
Would definitely stay again.
